Title: A small step for you, but a huge leap for us all
Description: Walk to or from work by foot.

Title: It has improved since you've last tried it
Description: Commute to work using public transport.

Title: Two wheels, one planet
Description: Bike to or from work today.

Title: Carpool karaoke
Description: Share a ride with at least one coworker.

Title: The scenic route
Description: Walk part of your commute instead of driving or taking the bus the whole way.

Title: Ticket to ride
Description: Use public transport for both legs of your commute.

Title: Detour delight
Description: Get off one stop early and walk the rest of the way.

Title: Eco-explorer
Description: Try a completely new, lower-emission commute method for a day.

Title: Weekend warrior
Description: Plan your errands so you use your car less this weekend.

Title: Charge it up
Description: Use an electric scooter or e-bike for your commute.

Title: Pack light, travel right
Description: Reduce what you carry to make walking or cycling easier.

Title: Buddy commute
Description: Coordinate your travel with a coworker to reduce emissions.

Title: Pay it forward
Description: Give a compliment to a coworker.

Title: The more the marrier
Description: Invite a colleague to lunch you don’t usually talk to.

Title: Kind words
Description: Thank someone who helped you this week.

Title: Shared lunch vibes
Description: Eat lunch with someone you don’t usually talk to.

Title: Plant buddy
Description: Water or care for an office plant today.

Title: Idea spark
Description: Share one sustainability tip or idea with your team.

Title: Kind words club
Description: Send a thank-you or appreciation message to a coworker.

Title: Green talk
Description: Start a short conversation about eco-friendly habits with a colleague.

Title: Collab cleanup
Description: Organize or join a quick office tidy-up with coworkers.

Title: Knowledge drop
Description: Share a sustainability-related article or video with your team.

Title: Snack share
Description: Bring in or share a healthy, low-waste snack with coworkers.

Title: Micro mentor
Description: Teach a coworker a small time- or energy-saving trick.

Title: Community spark
Description: Propose or start a small sustainability initiative at work.

Title: Less to carry
Description: Have lunch without creating any waste.

Title: Childs play
Description: Separate all your waste.

Title: Refill & chill
Description: Use a reusable water bottle or coffee cup today.

Title: Lovely lunchbox
Description: Bring your own container for takeout or leftovers.

Title: Paperless pro
Description: Go a full day without printing anything.

Title: Compost hero
Description: Separate and compost your organic waste.

Title: Staple-free day
Description: Avoid using staples—try paper clips or digital documents instead.

Title: Trash detective
Description: Check if an item can be recycled before throwing it away.

Title: Napkin ninja
Description: Use a reusable cloth napkin or towel instead of paper ones.

Title: Digital receipts only
Description: Request or save your receipt digitally instead of printing it.

Title: Refuse the refuse
Description: Say no to single-use items like straws, cups, or plastic cutlery today.

Title: Reuse revolution
Description: Find a creative way to repurpose or reuse something instead of discarding it.

Title: IT'S LEG DAY
Description: Set a timer to stand up from your desk every 45 minutes.

Title: A stroll through town
Description: Take the time to go for a short walk during the day.

Title: Stretch it out
Description: Do a 5-minute stretching session during work hours.

Title: Hydration nation
Description: Drink at least 5 glasses of water throughout the day.

Title: Mindful minute
Description: Take 60 seconds to focus on your breathing or meditate.

Title: Green gaze
Description: Rest your eyes by looking at something green (like a plant) every hour.

Title: Posture pro
Description: Adjust your chair and monitor for better ergonomics.

Title: Step counter champion
Description: Reach 6,000 steps or more during your workday.

Title: Lunch al fresco
Description: Eat lunch outdoors or near a window with natural light.

Title: Plant power
Description: Eat a fully vegetarian meal today.

Title: Desk detox
Description: Clear and organize your workspace for a mental reset.

Title: Early riser
Description: Start your day with a walk, stretch, or light exercise before work.

Title: It's good practice
Description: Put your pc in suspend every time you get up from your desk.

Title: Lights out
Description: Turn off the lights when leaving a meeting room or office.

Title: Silent break
Description: Unplug your chargers or devices when not in use.

Title: Power nap for your screen
Description: Lower your monitor brightness to 50% or enable energy-saving mode.

Title: The cold never bothered me anyway
Description: Turn down the thermostat by 1°C or dress warmer instead of heating more.

Title: Lights out
Description: Turn off the lights whenever you leave a room.

Title: Power nap for your screen
Description: Enable energy-saving or dark mode on your computer or monitor.

Title: Silent break
Description: Unplug chargers and devices that aren't in use.

Title: Chill vibes only
Description: Turn the thermostat down 1°C and dress warmer instead.

Title: Sunshine state
Description: Use natural daylight instead of artificial lighting for at least one hour.

Title: Unplugged hero
Description: Completely shut down your PC at the end of the day.

Title: Sleep mode engaged
Description: Set your monitor and computer to auto-sleep after 5 minutes of inactivity.

Title: Dim the glow
Description: Lower your monitor brightness to 50% or less.

Title: Team shutdown
Description: Encourage your whole team to turn everything off before leaving the office.

Title: Cool operator
Description: Avoid using personal heaters or fans for the entire day.
